## ReadableProtocol.getTotalRedistributed() method

Get the total collateral and debt per stake that has been liquidated through redistribution.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTotalRedistributed(): Promise<Trove>;
```
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Trove](./stablecoin-lib-base.trove.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Remarks

Needed when dealing with instances of [TroveWithPendingRedistribution](./stablecoin-lib-base.trovewithpendingredistribution.md)<!-- -->.
